source.14de0997:
from tqdm import tqdm
from time import sleep

text = ""
for char in tqdm(["a", "b", "c", "d"]):
    sleep(0.25)
    text = text + char
    print(text)
source.66e00696:
pbar = tqdm(["a", "b", "c", "d"])
for char in pbar:
    sleep(0.25)
    pbar.set_description("Processing %s" % char)
source.f435aea6:
with tqdm(total=100) as pbar:
    for i in range(10):
        sleep(0.1)
        pbar.update(10)
source.2dfcc008:
pbar = tqdm(total=100)
for i in range(10):
    sleep(0.1)
    pbar.update(10)
pbar.close()
